{"id":522590363,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 years, 5 months","timestamp":1626290270,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/522590363/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Roman to Integer","memory":"6.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int romanToInt(string s) {\n         int n = s.size();\n        vector<int> cnt(n, 0);\n        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){ //count num for each character\n            switch(s[i]){\n                case 'I':\n                    cnt[i] = 1;\n                    break;\n                case 'V':\n                    cnt[i] = 5;\n                    break;\n                case 'X':\n                    cnt[i] = 10;\n                    break;\n                case 'L':\n                    cnt[i] = 50;\n                    break;\n                case 'C':\n                    cnt[i] = 100;\n                    break;\n                case 'D':\n                    cnt[i] = 500;\n                    break;\n                case 'M':\n                    cnt[i] = 1000;\n                    break;\n            }\n        }\n        int sum = 0;\n        for(int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {\n            if(cnt[i] >= cnt[i+1]){//if cnt[i] >= cnt[i+1], add this num, else, subtract \n                sum += cnt[i];\n            }\n            else {\n                sum -= cnt[i];\n            }\n        }\n        sum += cnt[n-1];//last num\n        return sum;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"roman-to-integer","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
